gems.name: astropanel
gems.info: This program shows essential data in order to plan your observations: 9 days weather forecast, full ephemeris for the Sun, the Moon and all major planets, complete with graphic representation of rise/set times, detailed info for each day with important astronomical events, star chart displayed in the terminal and more. Version 4.0.0: Breaking change - requires rcurses 6.0.0+ with explicit initialization for Ruby 3.4+ compatibility.
